like oars. Nothing else </br> smells like the ocean save for your hair </br></br>

after salt has tied into. Fingers </br> of the Navy Yard Basin make a pass </br></br>

at the BQE. By East Mill, Body </br> pulls a tooth from its mother, </br></br>

her mouth the rigid shore. Says </br> when none of us were happy </br></br>

we went to the creeks, separate </br> like corners. We are arrows </br></br>

in the same animal. Infidelity</br> has always tempted us.</br></br>
